Rituximab in the management of juvenile pemphigus foliaceus

BACKGROUND
Rituximab is a chimeric, anti-CD20 monoclonal antibody registered for the treatment of B-cell malignancies and refractory rheumatoid arthritis in Australia.

Currently, rituximab is only FDA-approved for treatment of follicular and diffuse large B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, rheumatoid arthritis, chronic lymphocytic leukemia, granulomatosis with polyangiitis (formerly Wegener's granulomatosis) and microscopic polyangiitis.
